steps.name: Complete an online application
steps.description: before the application deadline and submit it to the Regional School Choice office.

steps.name: Results will be mailed to families
steps.description: by the Regional School Choice Office

steps.name: If selected, you will have a window in which to accept the placement.
steps.description: Following acceptance, a shadow day can be arranged by calling (860) 695-9095. If not selected, you will be notified of your position on the waiting list.

steps.name: Complete registration
steps.description: Registration paperwork for the school must be received at UHSSE by deadline

incomingStudentInstructions.description: Incoming freshmen will participate in placement testing . Testing generally takes about one hour per assessment.
tests: Spanish (any student with prior language experience/native speakers)

openHouses.description: Open Houses will begin at 10am at UHSSE and allow you to tour the school, see our robotics team in action, and meet the teachers and students of UHSSE!
